trans-unit.source: Create your first app
trans-unit.target: Create your first app

trans-unit.source: It's easier than you think to create a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: It's easier than you think to create a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Create your first app
trans-unit.target: Create your first app

trans-unit.source: It's easier than you think to create a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: It's easier than you think to create a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: You don't need to learn a new language to start—you can create it with what you already know:
trans-unit.target: You don't need to learn a new language to start—you can create it with what you already know:

trans-unit.source: C# or Visual Basic with XAML
trans-unit.target: C# or Visual Basic with XAML

trans-unit.source: C++ with XAML
trans-unit.target: C++ with XAML

trans-unit.source: JavaScript with HTML/CSS
trans-unit.target: JavaScript with HTML/CSS

trans-unit.source: These tutorials help you create your first UWP app in the language of your choice.
trans-unit.target: These tutorials help you create your first UWP app in the language of your choice.

trans-unit.source: Here, you'll learn how to:
trans-unit.target: Here, you'll learn how to:

trans-unit.source: Create a UWP app project in Microsoft Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Create a UWP app project in Microsoft Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Add UI elements and code to the project.
trans-unit.target: Add UI elements and code to the project.

trans-unit.source: Build and debug your app on the local machine and on a phone emulator.
trans-unit.target: Build and debug your app on the local machine and on a phone emulator.

trans-unit.source: To get started, choose the language you prefer.
trans-unit.target: To get started, choose the language you prefer.

trans-unit.source: C#/Visual Basic and XAML tutorials
trans-unit.target: C#/Visual Basic and XAML tutorials

trans-unit.source: Use your .NET, WPF, or Silverlight skills to build apps using XAML with C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: Use your .NET, WPF, or Silverlight skills to build apps using XAML with C# or Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Create a "Hello, world" app using XAML with C# or VB
trans-unit.target: Create a "Hello, world" app using XAML with C# or VB

trans-unit.source: We assume you're already comfortable with XAML and either C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: We assume you're already comfortable with XAML and either C# or Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/).
trans-unit.target: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/).

trans-unit.source: C# Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners
trans-unit.target: C# Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners

trans-unit.source: VB Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners
trans-unit.target: VB Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners

trans-unit.source: XAML Deep Dive for Windows & Windows Phone Apps Jump Start
trans-unit.target: XAML Deep Dive for Windows & Windows Phone Apps Jump Start

trans-unit.source: Visual C++ component extensions (C++/CX) and XAML tutorials
trans-unit.target: Visual C++ component extensions (C++/CX) and XAML tutorials

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of your C++ programming expertise to build apps using Visual C++ component extensions (C++/CX) with XAML .
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of your C++ programming expertise to build apps using Visual C++ component extensions (C++/CX) with XAML .

trans-unit.source: Create a "Hello, world" app using XAML with C++/CX
trans-unit.target: Create a "Hello, world" app using XAML with C++/CX

trans-unit.source: We assume you're already comfortable with XAML and C++.
trans-unit.target: We assume you're already comfortable with XAML and C++.

trans-unit.source: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=389916).
trans-unit.target: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=389916).

trans-unit.source: C++: A General Purpose Language and Library Jump Start
trans-unit.target: C++: A General Purpose Language and Library Jump Start

trans-unit.source: XAML Deep Dive for Windows & Windows Phone Apps Jump Start
trans-unit.target: XAML Deep Dive for Windows & Windows Phone Apps Jump Start

trans-unit.source: JavaScript and HTML tutorials
trans-unit.target: JavaScript and HTML tutorials

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of your web skills to build apps using HTML5, Cascading Style Sheets, Level 3 (CSS3), and JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of your web skills to build apps using HTML5, Cascading Style Sheets, Level 3 (CSS3), and JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: Create a "Hello, world" app using HTML and JavaScript
trans-unit.target: Create a "Hello, world" app using HTML and JavaScript

trans-unit.source: We assume you're already comfortable with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: We assume you're already comfortable with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=389916).
trans-unit.target: If you want to learn the basics, or just refresh your memory, try these courses from the [Microsoft Virtual Academy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=389916).

trans-unit.source: JavaScript Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners
trans-unit.target: JavaScript Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners

trans-unit.source: HTML5 & CSS3 Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners
trans-unit.target: HTML5 & CSS3 Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners

trans-unit.source: Other resources
trans-unit.target: Other resources

trans-unit.source: If you want to develop games using C++ and Microsoft DirectX, see [Developing games on Windows 10](https://dev.windows.com/games).
trans-unit.target: If you want to develop games using C++ and Microsoft DirectX, see [Developing games on Windows 10](https://dev.windows.com/games).

trans-unit.source: Already have experience with iOS or Android?
trans-unit.target: Already have experience with iOS or Android?

trans-unit.source: The [Porting apps to Windows 10](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt238321) section has resources to help you get started.
trans-unit.target: The [Porting apps to Windows 10](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt238321) section has resources to help you get started.
